title: A true accompt of the proceedings (and of the grounds of the proceedings) of the president and officers of St. Mary Magdalen College in Oxford, against Dr. Yerburie lately a fellow of the same printed only to save the labour of transcribing many copies, and to prevent the mistakes thereby apt to be incurr'd, and meerly for the satisfaction of private friends, who either want or desire a most impartial information of that affair.
author: Pierce, Thomas, 1622-1691.
